content: I have noticed that in the connectathon page , it was mentioned that the Argonaut Project has chosen CDS Hooks as a focus for 2017. What are the details about this Argonaut project. Will it involve implementation sprints like what was done with FHIR and SMART on FHIR? How can I stay abreast of the developments in this project.
Hey Kalyani - all you need to do to stay abreast of our work here is to follow our Google Group :-)

Make sure you're setup to get emails (either as they come in or in a digest manner). I was chatting with someone else a few weeks ago who missed some of our latest happenings and it was because they had their account setup to not get emails
In the future I'll make sure to post something on Zulip too to give people a heads up to make sure we're hitting all of our audiences :-)

Hey Kalyani - to elaborate on Kevin's answer, here's the slides that were covered during the first Arognaut's kick off call. It would definitely make sense for you to participate - https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Dm1oje_tk2H6kE_Xikbf4KXk9osCcLOZOH7p1DvLsVY/edit#slide=id.p4

Hi guys, I joined the participants list as a CDS Service participant. My group is looking to use CDS-Hooks spec for integration between our CDS system and EMRs, eventually those with Argonaut and others we are currently working with. We will be watching the spec development keenly. Thanks for opening the list up!

Thank you Isaac for including the ppt. We will definitely be participants.

Thanks,
Kalyani
Thanks for sharing, guys. I somehow missed the announcement for the first call, but look forward to catching up at the next call
Is there an Argonaut call today for CDS-Hooks? If so where is the call -in information?
There isn't a call today -- it's Thursday
Thanks @Kevin Shekleton Do you know where I can find the call-in information?

@Kalyani Yerra:
Dial in: 866-951-1151 Code: 5093906
Webinar: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/5333721393020156418
And the call is Thursday, May 18th from 3-4PM ET
